quote: They never show crowds like that. Look at that, it goes all the way back. They never show crowds. They don't show crowds.
quotePlain: They never show crowds like that. Look at that, it goes all the way back. They never show crowds. They don’t show crowds.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: This often repeated claim doesn’t take a lot of effort to debunk. The media has documented Trump’s crowds through stories, social media, photos and videos.
checks.quotePlain: This often repeated claim doesn’t take a lot of effort to debunk. The media has documented Trump’s crowds through stories, social media, photos and videos.

claims.title: the media doesn't cover Trump crowd sizes
claims.negative: the media does cover Trump crowd sizes
claims.negativePlain: the media does cover Trump crowd sizes
